pr_title: [RW-4591][risk=no]API: add the new column for parent & children

timeline.bodyText: We could change these to be Long instead of String to match the database. I think we changed  count from String to Long in the db somewhere along the way and we didn't update it here.
timeline.author: freemabd

timeline.bodyText: If we change those we would no longer need these Transient properties for count, rollup count and item count.
timeline.author: freemabd

timeline.message: Parent and Child Count Long in DBCriteria
Change count type from string to Long DbCriteria

timeline.bodyText: You need to add parentCount and childCount to the equals() and hashCode() methods
timeline.author: freemabd

timeline.message: Add parent and child count to Equal and Hash method
